mapper.select: select * from menu order by parent_id, menu_id
mapper.insert: insert into menu(parent_id, board_id, menu_name, menu_url, menu_depth, sort_order, is_active) values(#{parentId}, #{boardId}, #{menuName}, #{menuUrl}, #{menuDepth}, #{sortOrder}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: update menu set parent_id = #{parentId}, board_id = #{boardId}, menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_url = #{menuUrl}, menu_depth = #{menuDepth}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, is_active = #{isActive} where menu_id = #{menuId}
